Metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5974 affecting package zziplib for versions less than 0.13.74-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2017-5974 affecting package zziplib for versions less than 0.13.74-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package zziplib is earlier than 0.13.74-1, affected by CVE-2017-5974
